description: Upgrade plan to migrate Java project to latest LTS versions

tasks.requirements: Upgrade JDK to version 21, update build configuration (pom.xml or build.gradle) to target Java 21, ensure all Java language features are compatible with Java 21
tasks.taskSummary: Successfully upgraded Java from version 17 to 21 (LTS). Updated pom.xml with java.version property. Project builds successfully and all unit tests pass. All dependencies are compatible with Java 21.

tasks.description: Upgrade Spring Boot to version 3.4 (latest stable)

tasks.description: Upgrade other dependencies to compatible versions
tasks.requirements: Update all third-party dependencies to versions compatible with Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4, resolve any transitive dependency conflicts, update security-critical dependencies to latest versions
